name: ASOCIACION DE USUARIOS DE INTERNET
goal: The Association of Internet Users aims to defend the interests of Internet Users and new technologies and to ensure their fair use.
interests: Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Environment, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Taxation, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Internet Gobernance Forums: IGFSpain, EURODIG IGF
- Copyright
- Open Internet
- Human Rights for Internet Users
- Privacy
- Social Networks Interoperation
